field.name: summary
field.value: If the type and service is flipped no exception if thrown

field.name: description
field.value:
If the type and service is flipped no exception if thrown
BTW this might be considered a feature request and not a bug???
So i should have had this <component id="tasks.service" type="AssemblyName.ServiceA, AssemblyName" service="AssemblyName.IServiceA, AssemblyName" /> Instead i had this <component id="tasks.service" type="AssemblyName.IServiceA, AssemblyName" service="AssemblyName.ServiceA, AssemblyName" />
This meant my property of type IServiceA was not injected.
Since there is no way that IServiceA can impliment ServiceA can some kind of configuration exception be thrown when the components.config is parsed

comment.author: tedfordgif
comment.text: i think there are some problems with your openid usage since i logged this bug -regards Simon Cropp

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
